page.title: 09HOMELIFE(FRIDAY)
page.content: After my mum has got us ready for school,she cleans the house & then prepares the dinner ready for when we come home.My dad who gets up about 9.00 to 9.30 plays with my brother Christopher.At 11.30 they go to the pit to collect his wages.In the afternoon my dad takes mum to Tesco to do the shopping.After tea she makes my dad's sandwiches & fills his flask so that he can go to work.Then she has a cup of tea while she sits watching the television with Christopher.After she has bathed Christopher she watches television and goes to bed when my dad comes home.
